description: SIMI VALLEY, CALIF. — Republican presidential front-runner Donald Trump last week sent a letter to CNN Worldwide President Jeff Zucker noting that his colorful personality was driving the 40-fold boost in the ad rates that CNN was charging for Wednesday night’s Republican presidential debate here at the Ronald Reagan Presidential Library. “While I refuse to brag, and you know very well, this tremendous increase in viewer interest is due 100% to ‘Donald J. Trump,'” noted the letter, which urged Zucker to donate the proceeds to veterans groups.Read full article >>
title: Wemple: Debating in the age of Trump
